property

draft_gold_answer:
θ-Notation: f(n) = θ(g(n)) if f(n) grows at the same rate as g(n), with f(n) ≤ c1 . g(n) and f(n) ≥ c2 . g(n) for constants c1, c2, and n0.

O-Notation: f(n) = O(g(n)) if f(n) grows slower than some multiple of g(n), i.e., f(n) ≤ c . g(n) for a constant c.

[p7:c13] Module 2 : Divide and Conquer (DAC)
Note : In DAC, divide and conquer is mandatory
but combine is optional.
●Algorithm DAC(A, 1, n)
●if(small(1, n)
●return (S(A, 1, n);
●Else
●m ←– Divide(1, n)
●S1 ←– DAC(A, 1, m)
●S2 ←– DAC(A, m+1, n)
●Combine (S1, S2);
